readme:
# nodemon-generator

Generate a default `nodemon.json` for your Node.js project/application when running it on local system.

[![apm](https://img.shields.io/apm/v/nodemon-generator.svg?style=flat-square)](https://atom.io/packages/nodemon-generator)
[![apm](https://img.shields.io/apm/dm/nodemon-generator.svg?style=flat-square)](https://atom.io/packages/nodemon-generator)
[![apm](https://img.shields.io/apm/l/nodemon-generator.svg?style=flat-square)](https://atom.io/packages/nodemon-generator)

You can customize the file, of course, after generating it.

### Install

Go to `Settings > Install` & then search for `nodemon-generator` under `Packages`

### Template
* `json-nodemon`

_More info about nodemon:_
* [Github](https://github.com/remy/nodemon)
* [Offical Website](http://nodemon.io/)

### Contribute

Pull requests are most welcome.

#### License
